hooks.command: notify-send -u critical -a 'Claude Code' 'Permission Needed' "$(cat | jq -r '.message // "Claude Code needs permission to proceed"')" && printf '\a' > "$(tmux display-message -p -t "${TMUX_PANE}" '#{pane_tty}')"

notify-send -u normal -a 'Claude Code' 'Waiting for Input' "$(cat | jq -r '.message // "Claude Code is waiting for your input"')" && printf '\a' > "$(tmux display-message -p -t "${TMUX_PANE}" '#{pane_tty}')"

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_info=""; if git -C "$dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$dir" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then changes=""; if ! git -C "$dir" --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$dir" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then changes="*"; fi; git_info=$(printf '\033[34m(%s%s)\033[0m ' "$branch" "$changes"); fi; fi; printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m %s-> ' "$dir" "$git_info"
